Review: So, I traded a kidney for the iPhone 15, and now I am homeless, but at least I can take gorgeous selfies under the stars! The camera is so sharp, it captured the moment my bank account decided to ghost me. The display is so vibrant, I can see the cosmos while lying on the sidewalk. And hey, at least with the iPhone 15, the photos of your kidney surgery will look amazing. I can see my future self asking, Was this really worth an organ?
